Title: arraySlice
Description: Returns a slice of the array.

array – Array of data.offset – Indent from the edge of the array. A positive value indicates an offset on the left, and a negative value is an indent on the right. Numbering of the array items begins with 1.length – The length of the required slice. If you specify a negative value, the function returns an open slice [offset, array_length - length]. If you omit the value, the function returns the slice [offset, the_end_of_array].
